entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Wawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:36 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 11:00 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: -1.8°C
Wind: ESE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow or freezing rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow changing to periods of freezing rain or ice pellets mixed with snow this evening then to snow near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 7:27 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 7:27 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 7:27 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6. Forecast issued 7:27 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
